subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Evan Dietrich-Smith returned to Green Bay in December 2010, only to be inactive during the Packers’ Super Bowl run. Now he is a key piece to their championship hopes this winter.
snippet: Evan Dietrich-Smith returned to Green Bay in December 2010, only to be inactive during the Packers’ Super Bowl run. Now he is a key piece to their championship hopes this winter.
